name: Ye Old Chocolate Chip
description: A classic chocolate chip cookie. Rich but simple.

name: Cookies and Cream(ier)
description: Like double stuffed oreos...but quadruple stuffed

name: Snicker Doodle
description: Just the right amount of crunch, with a warm and soft inside.

name: Halloweekend
description: A spookily sprinkled delight! Enjoy a soft pillow cookie with a semi-sweet rum glaze.

name: Chocolate Peanut Swirl
description: A delightful swirl of creamy, melted dark chocolate and rich peanut butter.

name: Glass of Milk
description: You guessed it: a glass of milk. Organic milk from happy cows. Served in your very own classic-style glass milk bottle.
